auth.getAuthUserFailedMessage: Unable to fetch user after login, please try again later. Contact admin if problem persists

errors.http404: Page not found. Contact admin if problem persists
errors.http500: An error occurred on our end. Reload the page, and if the problem persists, contact admin

validation.form: Please fill out the form correctly
validation.invalidForm: Invalid form, please fill out the form correctly

mustContain.uppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter

passwords.minCount: Your password must have at least 8 characters

errors.404NotFound: Oops! We can't find the page you're looking for.

hints.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

messages.passwordResetSuccess: Password reset successful, you will be redirected to login page
